mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO demo_stock (dealer_code, order_id, saaa, sbbb, sccc, sddd, seee, sfff, sggg, shhh, siii, sjjj, skkk, slll, smmm, snnn, sooo, sppp, sqqq, srrr, ssss, sttt) VALUES
(#{item.dealerCode}, #{item.orderId}, #{item.saaa}, #{item.sbbb}, #{item.sccc}, #{item.sddd}, #{item.seee}, #{item.sfff}, #{item.sggg}, #{item.shhh}, #{item.siii}, #{item.sjjj}, #{item.skkk}, #{item.slll}, #{item.smmm}, #{item.snnn}, #{item.sooo}, #{item.sppp}, #{item.sqqq}, #{item.srrr}, #{item.ssss}, #{item.sttt})
